'''''Vinyar Tengwar 12''''' is the twelfth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|11|13}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "The Storming of Gondolin" — Tom Loback
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "''Nólë i Meneldilo'': Lore of the Astronomer"✫ — Jorge Quiñónez and Ned Raggett
* "''[[Narqelion]]'': A Translation by Paul Nolan Hyde" — Jorge Quiñónez
* "Transitions in Translations: The If and When of the Dominion of Men" (column) — Arden R. Smith

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
